SELECT p.PLACE_TYPE_ID AS placeTypeId, p.PLACE_TITLE AS placeTitle, p.PLACE_ADDR AS placeAddr, p.PLACE_THUMB AS placeThumb, (SELECT a.AREA_NAME FROM AREA_CODE a WHERE a.AREA_CODE = p.AREA_CODE) AS area, (SELECT s.SIGUNGU_NAME FROM SIGUNGU_CODE s WHERE s.AREA_CODE = p.AREA_CODE AND s.SIGUNGU_CODE = p.SIGUNGU_CODE) AS sigungu FROM PLACE_INFO p
WHERE p.PLACE_TYPE_ID = #{type[0]} AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SEARCH_KEYWORD k WHERE k.PLACE_TYPE = #{type[0]} AND ( k.KEYWORD LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR k.CAT1 = p.PLACE_CAT1 OR k.CAT2 = p.PLACE_CAT2 OR k.CAT3 = p.PLACE_CAT3 OR k.AREA_CODE = p.AREA_CODE ) ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SEARCH_KEYWORD k WHERE k.PLACE_TYPE = #{type[0]} AND k.KEYWORD LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' AND k.PLACE_ID = p.PLACE_ID ) )
